title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the expression new Date('3/2/2005') as the value in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
EB: The expression new Date('3/2/2005') should be accepted as a valid value in the table filter.
SR:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset that contains a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table into the report. 
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 
4. In the 'Value1' field of the filter, input the expression new Date('3/2/2005').
